name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet Cost Tracker, a calculator for GCalendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With MeetCostTracker, calculate the total cost of a meeting based on the hourly rate of its participants.

ðŸ’¡ Fri, November 3rd, 2023's update - we've developed a version compatible with Google Workspace, which lets you define a precise hourly rate for each user. Don't hesitate to drop us a line and let us know if you're interested!

MeetCostTracker is a simple and useful extension that calculates the total cost of a meeting based on the hourly rate of its participants. It helps you keep track of the expenses of your meetings and ensures that you don't exceed your budget. 

With MeetCostTracker, you can easily monitor your meeting costs and make informed decisions to optimize your spending.
